data.text:
"Crayon Shin-Chan (episode)" Series Game Grumps Game Crayon Shin-Chan Description The one-est one-off of all time. Release Date March 1, 2013 Length 11:09 Link Crayon Shin-Chan - Game Grumps One-Off Guide ← previous

"Top Shop" next →

"Drakkhen"

Crayon Shin-Chan is the only episode of Crayon Shin-Chan.

Jon's Songs[]

"We have been havin' a lot of fun! What's that? Is that a radiator? What's in the background? Is that an Asian kid? Is that a bush? Is that an Asian kid?" about 3 min 40 sec in.

"Probably should've played the game! (Clapping in the style of the Cha-Cha Slide)" about 8 min 10 sec in.

"Mom. You and me. Gonna go. To the ex-po-sé! To the exposé, to the exposé! Everybody gay to the exposé! Exposé! Exposé! Everybody go to the exposé!" about 10 min 25 sec in.

"Game Grumps are bad! Grumps awful! Who even comes here? We eat falafel!" about 10 min 50 sec in.

"Barry, go! Barry, go! Barry is the best!" about 11 min in.

Trivia[]

This episode is the second episode to feature a cold open.
